Vulois

"Yes, Child. You have solved my riddle. now take the key from my 
hand, and open the door to your power!"

______________________________________________________________________
Prebon escorted Spears into the main bridge, where the others were at 
their posts. He smiled as Spears put her head on his shoulder. Deeper 
and deeper into his web of deception she fell. He wondered that if he 
removed the chip hat she would still stay with him. But she wouldn't, 
he knew it. She would turn on him the first chance he got. But 
nonetheless, she was here, serving him. He called everyone together.

"Alright! We leave very soon to get Ramulus. He will be our link to 
rule the Maximals. Now, let's revise the plan. There will be no 
fighting. Bullet and Blaze, you will stay here and guard the 
prisoner. Spears, Hammer Ignatius and myself will go on to the Ark. 
Ignatius and Hammer will be holding Spears tight, and she will be 
screaming, pretending to be wanting help. You will have to put on 
your most convincing performance ever. I will tell Ramulus that if he 
wants you and Striker alive, than he'll meet me one on one. I'll say 
that I'll exchange the prisoners for a map of all base locations, but 
when Ramulus comes, we'll hit him with the chip. We will send him 
back with Striker, whose memory has been cleared, and he will say 
that the Maximals have hit a permanent Alliance with The Trainers, 
and Spears is staying with us as ambassador. Than anytime we want to 
attack, we will have full Maximal support because, well, I will be 
the leader of the Maximals. Everyone understand?"
